statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, ad_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, timestamp FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE ad_id = 101 ORDER BY interaction_type DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 202 OR interaction_type LIKE '%click%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, ad_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('view', 'click') ORDER BY customer_id, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS interaction_count FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING interaction_count > 5 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ad_targeting WHERE ad_cost > 500.00;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Click';
SELECT * FROM ad_targeting ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT ad_id, target_audience FROM ad_targeting WHERE ad_type = 'Social Media' AND ad_cost < 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_duration FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_duration > 60
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ad_targeting WHERE ad_cost < 1000 ORDER BY ad_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, ad_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions INNER JOIN ad_targeting ON customer_interactions.ad_id = ad_targeting.ad_id
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_cost < 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_location FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_target_audience FROM ads ORDER BY ad_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age, customer_gender, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 AND customer_gender = 'F' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Display' ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT customer_name, ad_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_interactions ci ON c.customer_id = ci.customer_id JOIN ads a ON ci.ad_id = a.ad_id WHERE c.customer_gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM Ads WHERE ad_cost > 100;
SELECT customer_id, ad_id, location, age FROM TargetingData WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT Customers.name, Ads.ad_name, Ads.ad_cost FROM Customers INNER JOIN CustomerInteractions ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerInteractions.customer_id INNER JOIN Ads ON CustomerInteractions.ad_id = Ads.ad_id WHERE Customers.email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT Customers.name, SUM(Ads.ad_cost) AS total_cost FROM Customers INNER JOIN CustomerInteractions ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerInteractions.customer_id INNER JOIN Ads ON CustomerInteractions.ad_id = Ads.ad_id GROUP BY Customers.name;

SELECT Customers.name, TargetingData.age, Ads.ad_type FROM Customers INNER JOIN TargetingData ON Customers.customer_id = TargetingData.customer_id INNER JOIN Ads ON TargetingData.ad_id = Ads.ad_id WHERE TargetingData.age >= 25;

SELECT CustomerInteractions.timestamp, Customers.name, Ads.ad_name, TargetingData.location FROM CustomerInteractions INNER JOIN Customers ON CustomerInteractions.customer_id = Customers.customer_id INNER JOIN Ads ON CustomerInteractions.ad_id = Ads.ad_id INNER JOIN TargetingData ON CustomerInteractions.customer_id = TargetingData.customer_id WHERE TargetingData.location = 'New York' ORDER BY CustomerInteractions.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_interaction;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM ad_interaction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM ad_interaction WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT ad_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM ad_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM ad_interaction WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT ad_id, interaction_type FROM ad_interaction WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT ad_id, customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM ad_interaction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, age, gender FROM customer WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT ad_id, target_age_min, target_age_max, target_gender, target_location FROM ad_targeting WHERE target_location LIKE '%USA%';
